statements: SELECT * FROM customer_contacts;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_contacts WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT customer_id, last_name, address FROM customer_contacts WHERE first_name = 'Alice';
SELECT first_name, phone_number, communication_preference FROM customer_contacts WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, address FROM customer_contacts ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_contacts WHERE communication_preference = 'Email' ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customer_contacts WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_contacts WHERE address LIKE '%123%' OR address LIKE '%456%' AND communication_preference = 'Phone' ORDER BY customer_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, email FROM customer_contacts WHERE first_name = 'John' OR last_name = 'Doe' ORDER BY customer_id ASC LIMIT 7;
SELECT DISTINCT communication_preference FROM customer_contacts ORDER BY communication_preference ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_contacts WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, email FROM customer_contacts WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT * FROM communication_preferences WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT customer_id, email, sms_notifications FROM communication_preferences WHERE push_notifications = TRUE;
SELECT last_name, address FROM customer_contacts WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customer_contacts WHERE email = 'example@mail.com';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_contacts WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, email FROM customer_contacts WHERE address IS NOT NULL ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_contacts WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' AND address LIKE '%Street%';

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, cp.email_notifications, cp.sms_notifications FROM customer_contacts c JOIN communication_preferences cp ON c.customer_id = cp.customer_id WHERE cp.push_notifications = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM CustomerContacts;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM CustomerContacts WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, email_subscription, sms_subscription FROM CommunicationPreferences WHERE sms_subscription = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM CommunicationLog WHERE communication_type = 'Email' ORDER BY communication_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, communication_date FROM CustomerContacts INNER JOIN CommunicationLog ON CustomerContacts.customer_id = CommunicationLog.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM CustomerContacts ORDER BY last_name, first_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM CustomerContacts WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, cp.email_subscription FROM CustomerContacts c JOIN CommunicationPreferences cp ON c.customer_id = cp.customer_id WHERE cp.email_subscription = TRUE;

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, cl.communication_type, cl.communication_date FROM CustomerContacts c JOIN CommunicationLog cl ON c.customer_id = cl.customer_id WHERE cl.communication_type = 'Email' ORDER BY cl.communication_date DESC;

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, cp.email_subscription, cp.sms_subscription, cp.app_notification, cl.communication_type, cl.communication_date FROM CustomerContacts c JOIN CommunicationPreferences cp ON c.customer_id = cp.customer_id JOIN CommunicationLog cl ON c.customer_id = cl.customer_id WHERE cp.email_subscription = TRUE AND cp.sms_subscription = TRUE AND cl.communication_type = 'SMS';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 'abc123';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT address_id, street_address, city, state, zip_code FROM addresses WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE preferred_contact_method = 'Email' AND opt_in = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE first_name = 'John';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN addresses ON customers.customer_id = addresses.customer_id WHERE city = 'New York';

SELECT customers.first_name, addresses.street_address, preferences.preferred_contact_method FROM customers JOIN addresses ON customers.customer_id = addresses.customer_id JOIN preferences ON customers.customer_id = preferences.customer_id;

SELECT customers.first_name, communications.communication_type, communications.communication_value FROM customers JOIN communications ON customers.customer_id = communications.customer_id WHERE communications.communication_type = 'Email';
SELECT * FROM CustomerContacts;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM CustomerContacts ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, email_opt_in, sms_opt_in FROM CommunicationPreferences WHERE sms_opt_in = true;
SELECT city, state, zip_code FROM Address WHERE state = 'CA';
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM OrderHistory WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerContacts;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM CustomerContacts WHERE id = 1;
SELECT cc.first_name, cc.last_name, co.order_date FROM CustomerContacts cc JOIN OrderHistory co ON cc.id = co.customer_id WHERE co.total_amount > 100;
SELECT cc.first_name, co.total_amount FROM CustomerContacts cc JOIN OrderHistory co ON cc.id = co.customer_id ORDER BY co.total_amount DESC;
SELECT cc.first_name, co.total_amount FROM CustomerContacts cc JOIN OrderHistory co ON cc.id = co.customer_id WHERE co.total_amount < 50 ORDER BY co.total_amount ASC;
